title: How to Find Your Silver Linings
description: Do you fixate on what's going wrong in your life? Poet and "recovering pessimist" Maggie Smith practices looking on the bright side.
itunes:subtitle: Do you fixate on what's going wrong in your life? Poet and "recovering pessimist" Maggie Smith practices looking on the bright side.
itunes:author: PRX and Greater Good Science Center
